item.description:
Let's get together for a nice walk along the beach.  I'd like to spend a couple hours outdoors, so plan for walking an hour or so along the beach, and then let's tackle some sand dunes if they're open!  I'm not too familiar with the dunes, having been through them just a few times, but there are maps along the way...let's be adventurous :)    If the dunes aren't open, I think we can walk up along the Crane Estate instead.  The fee (in addition to $1 meetup fee) is $4 carload for members, $8 a carload for nonmembers, so we can arrange carpooling from the train station if you'd like.  I look forward to seeing you!

Note...I'm closing RSVPs for this tomorrow evening, so that if there is not enough interest I will have time to cancel and make alternate plans.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the parking lot
item.why: Sunday is going to be beautiful, it's low tide, and Spring is here!

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Walk Crane Beach, Estate, or Dunes!
